QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when auto_minor_version_upgrade then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  case
    when auto_minor_version_upgrade then title || ' automatic minor version upgrades enabled.'
    else title || ' automatic minor version upgrades not enabled.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_rds_db_instance;
